request.description: This is the API to sign in, it returns tokken
Use thes to create new user, returns tokken
Delete the assosiated product with the chosen id
For pagination you can use page and count queries, they are optional, if you did not send them, they considered as page 0 and count 20 by default.

request.description: For pagination you can use page and count queries, they are optional, if you did not send them, they considered as page 0 and count 20 by default.

orderBy can have positive and negative sign at the begining, the "-" sign means DESC order and the abcense of this value means ASC order for example you can use:

- orderBy= price => this send the result in an ASC according to the price
- orderBy= -price => this send the result in an DESC according to the price
    

to filter the result you can use the following in your query : \[title,category,brand,minPrice,maxPrice,rating,createdAt,updatedAt\]
